attributes.action: Jobseekers Allowance should be paid back after getting a job.
attributes.additional_details: As the money given to students whilst in education has to be paid back in installments, once a job has been found, it seems logical that Jobseekers Allowance should follow this principle, there should be no such thing as "free money." Once the person finds a job, a percentage of their salary should be returned to the Governement, they should give back to the country that helped them.
